yoruba_long_1.wav.ground_truth: I've been overcharged for international calls I didn't make; can you investigate and process a refund for me please?

awarri.translation: They have mostly accepted my request regarding the global calls I made. You can review this accusation before returning that request to me.

spitch.transcription: Wọn ti gba owó jùlọ fún mi lórí àwọn ìpè àgbáyé tí mo ṣe, a lè ṣe àyẹ̀wò ẹ̀sùn yìí, kí ẹ sì dá owó náà fún mi padà ẹjọ́.
spitch.translation: They have taken most of the money from me regarding the international calls I made, we can review this accusation, and you should return that money to me.

yoruba_long_2.wav.ground_truth: I want to upgrade my plan to include more data and unlimited calls; what's the best option for heavy users?

awarri.translation: I want to elevate my plan so that I can have more sales, and so that the calls will not have limitations, which will be most beneficial for someone who uses it a lot.

spitch.transcription: Mo fẹ́ gbé ètò mi sókè kin lè ní dítà tó pọ̀sí àti kí èpè má nídìíwọ̀, èwo ni yóò dáa jùlọ fún ẹni tí ó ń lo púpọ̀?
